segments.pli: “Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti?
segments.en: “Sir, how many qualities should a mendicant have to be attended on by a novice?”

segments.pli: “Dasahi kho, upāli, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
segments.en: “Upāli, a mendicant should have ten qualities to be attended on by a novice.

segments.pli: Idhupāli, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti … pe … samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is ethical …

segments.pli: pātimokkhaṃ kho panassa vitthārena svāgataṃ hoti suvibhattaṃ suppavattaṃ suvinicchitaṃ suttaso anubyañjanaso;
segments.en: Both monastic codes have been passed down to them in detail, well analyzed, well mastered, well judged in both the rules and accompanying material.

segments.pli: paṭibalo hoti gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā;
segments.en: They’re able to care for the sick or get someone else to do so.

segments.pli: paṭibalo hoti anabhiratiṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā;
segments.en: They’re able to settle dissatisfaction or get someone else to do so.

segments.pli: paṭibalo hoti uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ;
segments.en: They’re able to dispel remorse when it has come up.

segments.pli: paṭibalo hoti uppannaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ dhammato vivecetuṃ;
segments.en: They’re able to rationally dissuade someone from misconceptions that come up.
They’re able to encourage someone in the higher ethics,

segments.pli: Imehi kho, upāli, dasahi dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti.
segments.en: A mendicant should have these ten qualities to be attended on by a novice.”
